title: Output Schema for putObject Operation
description: Output schema for the putObject operation in the connector.

payload.description: The main response payload from the putObject operation.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

result.description: The result object containing the putObject response data.

eTag.description: Entity tag for the uploaded object.

serverSideEncryption.description: The server-side encryption algorithm used when storing this object in Amazon S3.
